name: ANTULUS
description:
dark times have fallen upon these lands. your son is ill, and requires nutrients from the environment. the most abundant source of delish mm mm goodness seems to be the ants that are everywhere. go cook some ants and feed your boy

grab your trusty shotgun and brave the lands outside

theres a couple of endings with many shocking twists and turns, can you find all of them???????????? ?? ?  ?

special thanks to little arteri for the tree and music and bronto burt for the cool ant queen and things
